contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 13th day of July, 2010, the Application for Leave to File Original Process, the Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus, and the Application for Stay of Proceedings are DISMISSED. See Commonwealth v. Reid, 537 Pa. 167, 642 A.2d 453 (1994) (hybrid representation is improper). The Prothonotary is directed to forward these filing to counsel of record.
